attributes.title: DONT DOWNLOAD
attributes.review: This app should not be available for download because it is just so awful. It takes forever to download, and when it finally does, it wipes your phone. It took me forever to figure out how to even use cheeto puffs app. 10/10 would not recommend.

attributes.title: Awful (DO NOT RECOMMEND)
attributes.review: If I could give more than 5 stars,😚I’d give it no stars 🥺because of how awful this app is. It took so many days to download 😔and it was stealing my data. 🤬It was glitching left and right for no reason😡It even crashed my phone and used a ton of my GB!!🧐🤮

attributes.title: This app killed my goldfish
attributes.review: This app took hours to download and when it did it was glitchy. Left my phone next to my fish tank and when I came back my goldfish was dead. It was staring at the screen and committed suicide by drowning. There was a note from my goldfish saying that the app made him do it. DO NOT DOWNLOAD!!!

attributes.title: absolutely horrific
attributes.review: as soon as i downloaded the app it played a super loud audio of “you’re ugly” and woke up all 57 of my cousins whom i share a farm with, then when i tried to exit the app it called me fat in 21 different languages so i turned off my phone but got a notification saying to kms. i tried to show it to my mom but it shut off as soon as i held it up and started playing “be happy” by dixie damelio. outraged, i tried to delete the app but was immediately spammed with pop ups of trumps nudes. take the app off immediately

attributes.title: NEVER AGAIN
attributes.review: I cannot express my disbelief that this app is even allowed to exist. It is an absolute waste of time and I am so disappointed that I will never get the time I wasted on the app back. When I opened it it took me to an alternate universe with a president that isn’t racist, homophobic, or a sexual assaulter. Crazy, right?!

attributes.title: No❤️
attributes.review: It asked me to put in my number and ofc I did but after that my phone went black and turned back on I went to check all my apps and when I went to my camera roll it was his nudes 😔✨💕💔 this is a warning do not download this app to save your eyes periodt love xx💕🦋💅🥰😍❤️✨

attributes.title: This is a terrible app
attributes.review: So, I was waiting HOURS for it to download. I the. Realized right before bed that it had finally downloaded. I opened up the app and all I saw was a picture of a racist, r@pist, homophobic, orange, ugly, sexist monster. It scarred me for life and I couldn’t take it I almost puked. At this point I think I’m just gonna vote for Biden. 🤷🏽‍♀️

attributes.title: Dont do it
attributes.review: App literally took over my life, downloaded it and fbi came to my house and asked if i got the app, then proceeded to put a chip in my neck and every 30 seconds i get naked and take picture then send them to trump, and if i fight it i here trumps voice say “dont disrespect daddy” very scary, but all in all save tiktok

attributes.title: HORRIBLE.
attributes.review: I wish i could give it 0 stars. Not only did it take my phone 56 hours to download this app, it crashed my phone 17x. Next thing i know i see my card was charged without my permission. This app makes my camera randomly turn on and made my dog a communist.

attributes.title: Give me a virus
attributes.review: So when I don’t know how to get a new phone took me so long to get because I had to work so many stuff for you to go to work come back with not that much money I get mad because of the virus on my phone and then I had to go get a new iPhone 11 Pro so I’m  mad 😡 🤬🤬🤬🤬😡😡😡😡😡🤬🤬🤬
